name.de: Teilen Sie das Plug-in für Google-Kontakte
name.he: שתף את הפלאגין של אנשי קשר של Google
name.ja: Google コンタクト プラグインを共有する
name.nl: Deel de plug-in voor Google Contacten

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Add sharing functionality to your Google Contacts interface... Exactly like you share Google Drive folders and docs.
short.de: Fügen Sie Ihrer Google-Kontakte-Oberfläche Freigabefunktionen hinzu... Genau so, wie Sie Google Drive-Ordner und -Dokumente…
short.es: Agregue funciones para compartir a su Administrador de contactos de Google. ¡De la misma manera que comparte sus documentos!
short.fr: Ajouter les fonctionnalités de partage à votre gestionnaire de contacts Google. De la même façon que vous partagez vos documents !
short.he: הוסף פונקציונליות שיתוף לממשק Google Contacts שלך... בדיוק כמו שאתה משתף תיקיות ומסמכים של Google Drive.
short.it: Aggiungi funzionalità di condivisione a Gestione contatti Google. Allo stesso modo in cui condividi i tuoi documenti!
short.ja: Google コンタクト インターフェイスに共有機能を追加... Google ドライブのフォルダやドキュメントを共有するのとまったく同じように。
short.ko: Google 주소록 인터페이스에 공유 기능을 추가하세요... Google 드라이브 폴더와 문서를 공유하는 것과 똑같습니다.
short.nl: Voeg deelfunctionaliteit toe aan uw Google Contacten-interface... Precies zoals u Google Drive-mappen en -documenten deelt.
short.ru: Добавьте функцию обмена в интерфейс Google Контакты... Точно так же, как вы делитесь папками и документами на Google Диске.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Share for “Google Contacts™” Plugin, you can:

→ Share Contact lists (known as “labels” in Google Contacts) with specific users or groups of users
→ Share Contacts between co-workers or with family, friends, colleagues etc.
→ Modify or add shared contacts in the shared groups
→ Shared contacts appear in search and show-up in Gmail autocomplete
→ Unlimited sharing capacity
→ Synchronization with mobiles/tablets and MS Outlook's "My Contacts"
→ Permissions management (Read Only/Can Edit/Can Delete/Can Share)
→ CreateShared Distribution List
→ Add, edit and access Shared contacts from any device
→ Instantly sync shared contacts across all devices like phone, tablet, laptop, desktop and other smart devices
→ Share contacts with users inside and outside of your team or domain
This plugin is specially designed for all the Google Workspace (G Suite) users so they can get the sharing feature right into their Contacts interface and easily share their contacts with any Gmail and Google Workspace (G Suite) users. Simply install our extension and start sharing your contact labels right from the Google Contacts manager.
